ComicInfo.Summary:
The Martian mayhem continues in Mega-City One! Dredd leads a detail of Judges in a bloody firefight with Martian forces, while scientists at HQ attempt to discover the nature of the mysterious metal sphere found in the city. But it may be too late to prevent a full-scale Martian invasion!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Greg Staples | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Loston Wallace (a) & Stephen Downer (c) | Missing | RE | Retailer Exclusive - Stan Lee's Comikaze Expo | John McCrea (a) & Jay Fotos (c) | 2 |

ComicInfo.Title: Latest Victim!
